Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Cermak
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Archer, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Cermak, Canal, Archer, and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Dempster-Skokie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
